headline: NEPCON JAPAN Opens Next Week at Tokyo Big Sight with 1,850 Exhibitors, Marking its 40th Anniversary
summary: RX Japan is all set to host the 40th edition of NEPCON JAPAN, one of the world's leading technology trade shows, from January 21–23, 2026, at Tokyo Big Sight. This milestone event will be held alongside three major exhibitions — AUTOMOTIVE WORLD, Factory Innovation Week, and Smart Logistics Expo — creating one of Asia's largest technology gatherings.
